participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.background: i'm in the third grade. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms. i've a pet cow.

content.text: hi, how are you? I am in third grade. what do you do?
that is cool. I sing songs on my playground. do you have any hobbies?
